action_description: This action will unlock the door.
This action will activate Auto Lock. Auto Lock automatically locks your door a certain time after the last unlock or if it is closed (with door sensor activated).
This action will open the door by pulling the latch.
This action will perform a Lock 'n' Go command, which unlocks your door and locks it again after a certain time.
This action will deactivate Auto Lock.
This action will lock the door.
